Motivational Wall Art – This canvas picture wall art designed with inspirational themed (printed letters Success), keep you positive every day, make people dare to pursue their dreams.
High Definition Premium Material – Inspirational Quote paintings feature clear printing, dust-proof, non-fading, UV-resistant, non-yellowing, is a very perfect decoration.
Sturdy Canvas Frame – 12*15 inch finest quality pine timber moulding for gallery quality profile. 1 inch wide wood bars and not easy to deform（but not a wood plaque）.
Ready To Hang Inspirational Wall Art – Each bedroom wall art has a metal hook already mounted on the wooden bar, ready to hung on the wall or stand on the table.
Fits Any Home Decor – This canvas wall art would be ideal for bathroom, apartment, office, living room, bedroom, or other places. A wonderful gift for your

Best Sellers Rank #171 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)
#5 in Humidifiers
Date First Available September 21, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $27.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more





Erie White
Erie Black
Huron White
Huron Black
Heating Pad
Cordless Massager
Capacity 250ML / 0.06 GAL 250ML / 0.06 GAL 4L / 1.05 GAL 4L / 1.05 GAL – –

Lasts up to 8 hours 8 hours 18 hours 18 hours – –

Smart Mode No No Yes Yes – –

Best Sellers Rank #91 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)
#1 in Indoor Propane Space Heaters
#2 in Indoor Electric Space Heaters
Date First Available August 8, 2019

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

Price: $73.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:08 UTC – Details)


Warm White Christmas C7 String Lights Set of 100 C7 Bulbs Indoor / Outdoor
Our C7 Christmas Lights create a fun, unique look when decorating for any special occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, tents, patios, awnings and Christmas decoration. These bulbs will screw into a socket and last for 3000 hours.
Add an inviting glow to your space with the Weather Resistant String of Clear C7 Bulb Lights. These lights are perfect for weddings, birthday parties, and other gatherings. These are ideal for adding a cozy atmosphere, or a charming and festive accent, to a casual evening under the stars.

SPECS
Bulb Count: 100
Bulb Spacing: 12 in.
Diameter of Bulb: 1 in.
Bulb & Socket Type: C7 w/ a C7 / E12 base
Total Length (end to end): 100 ft
UL Listed for Indoor & Outdoor Use.
100 Lights Included: C7 E12 Base Light sockets, 5 watts per bulb
One bulb goes out will not affect other bulbs; built in fuse for safety and the electrical plug contains a spare fuse; UL listed. Perfect for Outside Christmas Garden Patio Yard Cafe Tent Porch Deck Party Backyard Decoration
Long Lasting Life: 5W 120V bulbs last for 3000 hours
100FT Long: 12″ spacing between bulbs, 6″ lead on both ends
For Installation, always mount the string first before screwing in the light bulbs. For replacement bulbs, please search for ASIN#B07W4915SZ.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $219.99 - $186.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:34:51 UTC – Details)


The Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier, is the high-efficiency air purifier to clean a whole room properly. AirSight Plus technology scans the surrounding air for airborne particles as small as 0.3um, this air purifier focuses on real-time home conditions – this is more than just having an air purifier. Levoit engineers designed the air purifier’s internal structure to provide powerful air purification while maintaining noise levels as low as 24dB. 
Features:

  • Intelligently purifies the air in a 403 sq ft room 5x per hour
  • HEPASmart technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home – Our air purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles as small as 0.3 microns including pollen, dust and more.
  • 360° filtration system uses activated carbon to remove gases and odors and a H13 True HEPA filter to capture 99.97% pollutants as small as 0.3 microns.
  • Automatically senses and reacts to changes in air quality – then reports pollution in real time on LCD screen and on your free VeSync Link app.
  • In the sleep mode, the air purifier monitors and purifies using the quiet settings, with a dimmed display and can be totally turned off.
  • Program your machine to turn off after pre-set intervals between 1 -12 hours.
  • Safe and easy to clean with low maintenance, easy-to-replace filters. With built-in notifications when they require replacing.
  • Using compatible voice control services, control your air purifier with simple, spoken instructions. Works with Alexa and Googlevoice Assistant.
  • Warning – unauthorized replacement filters are not tested or verified to perform at HEPA standard. Only authentic Levoit  filters are recommended to ensure a sealed system and proper functioning of the machine. The official Levoit Core 400S replacement filter can be found by searching “B08SQQK6K7” in the search bar.

LARGE COVERAGE: The top-performing Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier can purify large rooms, such as bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, and basements. Purify a 403 ft² room 5x per hour and a 990 ft² room 2x per hour
3-STAGE FILTRATION: Filtration includes a Pre-Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, which traps viruses, bacteria, pollen,dust, and pet dander, and a Custom High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter that helps neutralize odors, cooking and wildfire smoke, and VOCs
WHISPER-LEVEL QUIET: Keep the Core 400S running throughout the night, as Sleep Mode uses the lowest fan speed (24dB) to create a sleep-friendly space that’s as quiet as falling leave
COMBAT ALLERGIES AND ASTHMA: Powerful air purification during allergy and wildfire seasons helps capture allergens that cause sneezing, congestion, breathing difficulties, and other symptoms
VIEW AIR QUALITY: The laser dust sensor scans the surrounding air for airborne particles, continuously updating the PM2.5 display and creating graphs in the VeSync app so you can see how your air quality has improved
HANDS-FREE VOICE COMMAND: Hands-free control with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant allows you to control settings when your hands are full with cooking, caring for babies and children, or playing with pets
SCHEDULE SETTINGS TO MATCH YOUR ROUTINE: Program the air purifier to use different modes and fan speeds at certain times, so you can have your week planned in advance. With scheduling, you never have to worry about forgetting to change your settings
TRUSTWORTHY AND SAFE: The Core 400S is Energy Star and FCC certified, ETL listed, and a recipient of the German Design Award (2021) and iF Design Award (2021). Only use Levoit replacement filters (search B08SQQK6K7) for best results and product performance

Control settings from anywhere, as well as create schedules, check filter life, view real-time air quality updates, and more with the free Vesync app.

The Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier, is the high-efficiency air purifier to clean a whole room properly. AirSight Plus technology scans the surrounding air for airborne particles as small as 0.3um, this air purifier focuses on real-time home conditions – this is more than just having an air purifier. Levoit engineers designed the air purifier’s internal structure to provide powerful air purification while maintaining noise levels as low as 24dB. 
Features:

  • Intelligently purifies the air in a 403 sq ft room 5x per hour
  • HEPASmart technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home – Our air purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles as small as 0.3 microns including pollen, dust and more.
  • 360° filtration system uses activated carbon to remove gases and odors and a H13 True HEPA filter to capture 99.97% pollutants as small as 0.3 microns.
  • Automatically senses and reacts to changes in air quality – then reports pollution in real time on LCD screen and on your free VeSync Link app.
  • In the sleep mode, the air purifier monitors and purifies using the quiet settings, with a dimmed display and can be totally turned off.
  • Program your machine to turn off after pre-set intervals between 1 -12 hours.
  • Safe and easy to clean with low maintenance, easy-to-replace filters. With built-in notifications when they require replacing.
  • Using compatible voice control services, control your air purifier with simple, spoken instructions. Works with Alexa and Googlevoice Assistant.
  • Warning – unauthorized replacement filters are not tested or verified to perform at HEPA standard. Only authentic Levoit  filters are recommended to ensure a sealed system and proper functioning of the machine. The official Levoit Core 400S replacement filter can be found by searching “B08SQQK6K7” in the search bar.

LARGE COVERAGE: The top-performing Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier can purify large rooms, such as bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, and basements. Purify a 403 ft² room 5x per hour and a 990 ft² room 2x per hour
3-STAGE FILTRATION: Filtration includes a Pre-Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, which traps viruses, bacteria, pollen,dust, and pet dander, and a Custom High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter that helps neutralize odors, cooking and wildfire smoke, and VOCs
WHISPER-LEVEL QUIET: Keep the Core 400S running throughout the night, as Sleep Mode uses the lowest fan speed (24dB) to create a sleep-friendly space that’s as quiet as falling leave
COMBAT ALLERGIES AND ASTHMA: Powerful air purification during allergy and wildfire seasons helps capture allergens that cause sneezing, congestion, breathing difficulties, and other symptoms
VIEW AIR QUALITY: The laser dust sensor scans the surrounding air for airborne particles, continuously updating the PM2.5 display and creating graphs in the VeSync app so you can see how your air quality has improved
HANDS-FREE VOICE COMMAND: Hands-free control with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant allows you to control settings when your hands are full with cooking, caring for babies and children, or playing with pets
SCHEDULE SETTINGS TO MATCH YOUR ROUTINE: Program the air purifier to use different modes and fan speeds at certain times, so you can have your week planned in advance. With scheduling, you never have to worry about forgetting to change your settings
TRUSTWORTHY AND SAFE: The Core 400S is Energy Star and FCC certified, ETL listed, and a recipient of the German Design Award (2021) and iF Design Award (2021). Only use Levoit replacement filters (search B08SQQK6K7) for best results and product performance

From the brand

YATOJUZI

In Life, You find us a special friend. This will be our great honor.

YATOJUZI is a brand about developing and designing healing crystals , leading the trend in Europe and America; We are dedicated to helping everyone who is stressed in modern society find peace and energy.

We adhere to the business philosophy of “Customer experience first” and the business principle of “Quality first, Integrity first”.We hope to bring customers a comfortable and enjoyable experience and add happiness and joy to their lives.

Source:

In the 21st century, there is a girl who often feels various pressures from work and life, She often felt lost and powerless, At this time she always wanted to hold on something. She hopes to get energy from it to support her. By a chance, she got a worry Stone made of healing crystal. From then on, whenever she felt stressed or sad, she would hold this crystal and rub it. She was surprised to find that her heart gradually calmed down.

The brand “YATOJUZI “was born.

She developed a strong interest in healing crystals, and began to study healing crystals and decided to recommend them to more people.

Crystals and Healing Stones

Healing Crystals

Healing Crystal for Meditation

The more often you program the crystal with this meditation the stronger it’s healing energy will be.

Healing Crystal to divine.

Since crystal divination connects you to your higher self, it can help stimulate your intuition.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.36 x 1.97 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 16, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ YATOJUZI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09XQR7HVJ

[Elephant Symbolize ]:Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.
[Powerful Intellect]The presence of an elephant in your life, whether in real life, the media, or elsewhere, can be a sign of wisdom for you to solve a problem or overcome an obstacle that may be in front of you. While you may feel incredibly emotional about a particular situation, you have a rational mind and are able to make logical decisions.
[Amethyst]:This purple stone is said to be incredibly protective, healing, and purifying. It’s claimed it can help rid the mind of negative thoughts and bring forth humility, sincerity, and spiritual wisdom. It’s also said to help promote sobriety. Sleep is another claimed benefit of this stone, from supposedly aiding in insomnia relief to understanding dreams.
[ After service]: If you have any questions, please tell us , we shall solve for you asap.We hope that all customers who use our crystal can be healed and happy everyday.

Welcome to YATOJUZI！


2 Inch Natural Healing Crystal Stones Elephant Figurine Statue Hand Carved Gemstone Energy Balancing Luck Gifts Collection Decor for Home Office Desk

Introduction to Elephants

Cute Elephants

  • Elephants are the largest existing land animals.
  • Distinctive features of elephants include a long proboscis called a trunk, tusks, large ear flaps, pillar-like legs, and tough but sensitive skin.

Elephant lifestyle

  • Elephants have a fission–fusion society, in which multiple family groups come together to socialise. .
  • Males leave their family groups when they reach puberty and may live alone or with other males.

What do elephants symbolize?

Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.

Suitable Occasion

Pocket Stone

2 inch suite be a pocket stone, perfect size in your palm and easy to carry for pocket or handbag to bring you peace, fortune and positive energy.

Gift Idea

This is a perfect gift all you love, a wonderful Christmas gifts, birthday gift, Housewarming gift for you, your families and your friends.

Desk Decor

Place it on your office desk can attract the positive energy to improve your wealth and lucky in your daily work.

Touching

An elephant symbolizes the ability to draw money from outside.Touching an elephant's trunk can bring money to your life or business.

Different materials have different benefits!!
